explanation: [0-0] A young man in a racing suit is in a room with posters on the walls and wires overhead. He sits in front of a computer desk, playing a racing game. He holds the steering wheel, concentrating on the screen, which displays the car selection interface.

[0-5] Then the man fiddles with the buttons under the steering wheel, continuing to browse the car selection interface. His eyes move between different car options, and finally he chooses a white car. At the same time, he gestures with his right hand to "pull" the virtual car out of the screen. A white toy car appears in the picture, he moves the white toy car from his right hand to his left hand, and looks to the right.

[5-12] Then his left hand moves down, the toy car in his hand is gone, and a white racing car appears outside the door. The man jumps excitedly in the garage, grabs a black helmet from the shelf and puts it on his head, carefully walking towards the door. Outside seems to be a race track with spectators sitting in the stands.
